alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 7:33PM CDT until June 24 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Central Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... South central Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pekin, or 33 miles southeast of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... McVille around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Petersburg, Niagara, McCanna and Orr. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
